message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. How about we settle on $9000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we try $8200?
I'm getting a bit impatient, Bob, but I'm willing to give you a slight discount. How about we say $9500 is out of the question, but I'll meet you at $9250?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. How about we try $8800?
I'm not willing to go as low as $8800, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $9000?
